snippet.title: Slitherine Next 2024 | RuneQuest: Warlords | Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
RuneQuest: Warlords is a battle-scale turn-based strategy game set in the RuneQuest universe. Immerse yourself in the rich lore of Glorantha. Become a warlord, master the use of runes and defend your tribe against the incursions of Chaos. Field an army drawing from heroes and creatures alike.

🎮 Wishlist now on Steam ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366500/RuneQuest_Warlords/
💬 Join the Discord Server ➡️ https://discord.gg/Xb5ap82qT4
🦎 More info on Slitherine ➡️ https://www.slitherine.com/game/runequest-warlords
